channel.title: Infirmity - Hern [Ambient/Experimental]
channel.description:
New single from my upcoming album, "Health," in which I will be taking a more ambient and less sample-driven approach to my usual experimental stuff on this account. I am looking forward to releasing more music like this in 2021.
Link is here: https://soundcloud.com/hernmusicofficial/infirmity
As usual, I hope you people can find some enjoyment out of the stuff I put out. Constructive criticism is also welcome (encouraged, really) as always.

item.title: Infirmity - Hern [Ambient/Experimental]
item.dc:creator: Hern-Meridian
item.description:
I will be releasing one more single after this and then dropping the album after that, so stay tuned.

Read full topic
